remarks: The derangement number is a function from finite sets to nonnegative integers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
statement:
derang.d $e |- D = ( x e. Fin |-> ( # ` { f | ( f : x -1-1-onto-> x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) =/= y ) } ) ) $.
derangf $p |- D : Fin --> NN0 $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
